title: How Farmers Harvest Eggplants in a Greenhouse: Modern Growing Techniques | Farming Documentary

tasks.task: Operating a hydroponic system in a greenhouse.

Monitoring and adjusting the nutrient-rich solution.
Supporting plant growth structures (wires, supports).

Mixing and cooking eggplant to produce sauces and dips.

tasks.task: Adapting eggplant in various culinary dishes.

Experimenting with recipes to showcase eggplant versatility.
